Specific Details: Castleisland, Co Kerry flood relief programme
Subject Matter: Castleisland, Co Kerry flood relief programme
Intended Results: To ensure that works carried out by Kerry County Council in its flood relief programme, does not cause flooding to private dwellings

Specific Details: Lobbied attendees on the day of the launch of the Macra na Feirme Common Agricultural Policy 2020 policy paper
Subject Matter: Lobbied attendees on the day of the launch of the Macra na Feirme Common Agricultural Policy 2020 policy paper
Intended Results: To ensure the the Common Agricultural Policy 2020 has included in it measures to increase and further generation renewal and thus include measures focused on young farmers.
Lobbying Activities: Launch of the Macra na Feirme Common Agricultural Policy 2020 policy paper in Buswells hotel|Event / Reception|1
Person primarily responsible for lobbyin: Sean Finan (National President), James Barber (Agricultural Affairs Committee Chair), Thomas Duffy (Agricultural Affairs Committee Vice-Chair), Denis Duggan (CEO) and Derrie Dillon (Agricultural Affairs Manager)

Lobbyist Name: Irish Cattle and Sheep Farmers Association
DPOs Lobbied: Danny Healy-Rae|TD|Dáil Éireann, the Oireachtas::Frances Fitzgerald|Minister|Department of Justice and Equality
Intended Results: To get a more robust response from Gardai, to ensure tougher sentencing and to obtain adequate resources to investigate and prosecute crime
Person primarily responsible for lobbyin: Eddie Punch Patrick Kent, Seamus Sherlock, JOhn Halley

Specific Details: Briefing members on the need for the Digital Age of Consent to remain at 13 as provided for in the Data Protection Bill 2018 as initiated

Subject Matter: Briefing members on the need for the Digital Age of Consent to remain at 13 as provided for in the Data Protection Bill 2018 as initiated
Intended Results: The Data Protection Bill provision for the Digital Age of Consent to be retained at 13 years

Specific Details: Lough Funshinagh crisis - action needed for the local farmers
Subject Matter: Lough Funshinagh crisis - action needed for the local farmers
Intended Results: Sufficient support for young farmers affected by the lough funshinagh crisis::Immediate action on the Lough Funshinagh crisis

Specific Details: Metting with Danny Healy Rae in relation to the provision of Housing for young people in Rural Ireland
Subject Matter: Metting with Danny Healy Rae in relation to the provision of Housing for young people in Rural Ireland
Intended Results: Increase visibility of the plight of young rural dwellers in need of housing

Specific Details: Call to Deputy Danny Healy Rea in relation to the issue of access to land for young farmers and the need for funding for the Land Mobility Service
Subject Matter: Call to Deputy Danny Healy Rea in relation to the issue of access to land for young farmers and the need for funding for the Land Mobility Service
Intended Results: For the Deputy to highlight the issue of access to land with the Minister for Agriculture and impress upon him the importance of funding for the the Land Mobility Service to help with access to land for young farmers and promote collaborative farming
Lobbying Activities: Text and phone call to the Deputy on the 9th November|Phone call|1
